@sofain Spreading COVID-19 nationally as Dolt45's voter suppression scheme. 

CODID-19 death before you vote, control post office it limit mail-in ballots, limit polling places in Democratic locations to create long lines and fear of COVID-19 standing in those long lines on election day.

entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day
